pages.text: Next Step, don't want to build the Arc Furnace? It's ok but there is a machine from Mekanism can smelting item like a normal furnace but can not doing any alloy recipes. To craft it, you need a Steel Casing and 2 Advanced Control Circuts ( Basic Control Circut + 2 Enriched Alloy in Crafting Table ==> Advanced Control Circut)
